channel.title: Abouts on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing

item.description: About InterMine InterMine was formed in 2002 at the University of Cambridge, originally as a Drosophila-dedicated resource, before expanding to become organism-agnostic, enabling a large range of organisations around the world to create their own InterMines. The InterMine team is part of Micklem lab, headed by Gos Micklem.

item.title: ISA-InterMine: accelerating and rewarding data sharing
item.description: The ISA-InterMine grant is funded by the Wellcome trust. Its start date is April 2018 and it runs for three years.

item.title: Making data FAIR using InterMine
item.description: This grant is funded by the BBSRC, and runs for three years starting July 2017.
